name: Navigate Multiple Siblings
description:
Use the plugin to navigate multiple selected siblings. Best use is with component instances.


How to use:

  1. Select multiple (same) instances.
  2. Press Enter key to enter the instance.
  3. Use plugin to move through siblings.


See video explainer.


Create keybindings (macOS only):

  1. Go to Keyboard > Shortcuts tab
  2. Select "App Shortcuts" on the left pane
  3. Add (+) Figma from "Application" dropdown
  4. Upward — under "Menu Title" write Upward and add your custom keybinding in "Keyboard Shortcuts"
  5. Downward — under "Menu Title" write Downward and add your custom keybinding in "Keyboard Shortcuts"
  6. Restart Figma and try it out ;)


—

Read a story — "Community Strikes Back — Figma plugin story" — or, how we created this plugin.
